attributes.description:
Price: R119900
Mileage: 185000km
2012 Hyundai Accent 1.6 GL manual for sale.
This car comes fitted standard with: Air Conditioning| Power Steering| Anti-lock Braking System (ABS)| Radio / CD| Security System| Air Bag| Central Locking.
This is a great family sedan at a reasonable price. Don't miss this great buy!
Car comes with full service history and books.

Finance is available at all major banks with a additional administrative fee.
All vehicles are sold with 101 Multi-point test and roadworthy certificate. Warranty options are available. 
Hyundai Accent 1.6 GL manual 
Power - 91 kW @ 6300 rpm
Torque - 156 Nm @ 4200 rpm
Economy - 5.9 l/100km
Emissions - 140 g/km
Emissions Rating - X
Gears - 5 / FRONT
Acceleration - 9.5 seconds
Top Speed - 190 km/h
Airbags (total) - 2
Length - 3,940 cm
Seats - 5
Fuel Tank Capacity - 45 litres
Boot Capacity - 295 litres
Service Intervals - 15,000 km
